description: This course goes into more detail on how to make the database objects more interactive within Microsoft Access 2010. Starting with an explanation of the different table relationships and setting advanced properties within a Table, this course shows you how to effectively use the tools within Microsoft Access to verify data as it gets entered into the database. Additionally, this course shows you how to import an Excel spreadsheet and use the different Action Queries to create a relational database. Finally, the course shows how to create interactive forms and reports by adding calculated controls.
title: Access 2010 Intermediate
